DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pedometer use overweight woman pregnancy . The study show pedometer help woman limit weight gain pregnancy . It also show benefit decrease diabetes , decrease high blood pressure , decrease rate cesarean section , decrease complication baby .
DOC.brief_title: Pedometer Use Prevent Excessive Pregnancy Weight Gain Overweight Women
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Pregnant Less 16 week gestation Body mass index 25 great first prenatal visit History spontaneous preterm delivery 2032 week gestation Medical contraindication exercise walking pregnancy
